search.query:
index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Duration>=0 Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending AttemptCount>=$min1_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max1_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval DurationSec=round((Duration*60),1) |table _time LoanID DurationSec AttemptCount |rangemap field=DurationSec "< 60 seconds"=1-60 "1min - 2.5min"=61-150 "2.5min - 5min"=151-300 "5min - 10min"=301-600 "10min - 30min"=601-1800 "30min - 60min"=1801-3600 default="> 1hr"
|stats count as "Number of Loans" avg(DurationSec) as Average avg(AttemptCount) as "Average Attempt Count" by range |eval sort_order= case(range="< 60 seconds",1, range="1min - 2.5min",2, range="2.5min - 5min",3,range="5min - 10min",4, range="10min - 30min",5, range="30min - 60min",6, range="> 1hr",7) |sort sort_order |eventstats sum(Number of Loans) as Total |eval "Average Duration (Seconds)"=round(Average,2) |eval "Average Attempt Count"=round('Average Attempt Count',2) |eval "Percentage of Data"=round('Number of Loans' / Total*100,2)."%" |fields range "Number of Loans" "Average Duration (Seconds)" "Average Attempt Count" "Percentage of Data" |rename range as Range
|append [search index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Duration>=0 Environment=PROD AttemptCount>=$min1_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max1_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval DurationSec=round((Duration*60),1) |table _time LoanID DurationSec AttemptCount |rangemap field=DurationSec "Total"=0-99999999
|stats count as "Number of Loans" avg(DurationSec) as Average avg(AttemptCount) as "Average Attempt Count" by range |eval sort_order= case(range="< 60 seconds",1, range="1min - 2.5min",2, range="2.5min - 5min",3,range="5min - 10min",4, range="10min - 30min",5, range="30min - 60min",6, range="> 1hr",7) |sort sort_order |eventstats sum(Number of Loans) as Total |eval "Average Duration (Seconds)"=round(Average,2) |eval "Average Attempt Count"=round('Average Attempt Count',2) |eval "Percentage of Data"=round('Number of Loans' / Total*100,2)."%" |fields range "Number of Loans" "Average Duration (Seconds)" "Average Attempt Count" "Percentage of Data" |rename range as Range]

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Duration>=0 Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending AttemptCount>=$min2_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max2_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval DurationSec=round((Duration*60),1) |table _time LoanID DurationSec AttemptCount |rangemap field=DurationSec "< 60 seconds"=1-60 "1min - 2.5min"=61-150 "2.5min - 5min"=151-300 "5min - 10min"=301-600 "10min - 30min"=601-1800 "30min - 60min"=1801-3600 default="> 1hr"
|stats count as "Number of Loans" avg(DurationSec) as Average avg(AttemptCount) as "Average Attempt Count" by range |eval sort_order= case(range="< 60 seconds",1, range="1min - 2.5min",2, range="2.5min - 5min",3,range="5min - 10min",4, range="10min - 30min",5, range="30min - 60min",6, range="> 1hr",7) |sort sort_order |eventstats sum(Number of Loans) as Total |eval "Average Duration (Seconds)"=round(Average,2) |eval "Average Attempt Count"=round('Average Attempt Count',2) |eval "Percentage of Data"=round('Number of Loans' / Total*100,2)."%" |fields range "Number of Loans" "Average Duration (Seconds)" "Average Attempt Count" "Percentage of Data" |rename range as Range
|append [search index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Duration>=0 Environment=PROD AttemptCount>=$min2_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max2_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval DurationSec=round((Duration*60),1) |table _time LoanID DurationSec AttemptCount |rangemap field=DurationSec "Total"=0-99999999
|stats count as "Number of Loans" avg(DurationSec) as Average avg(AttemptCount) as "Average Attempt Count" by range |eval sort_order= case(range="< 60 seconds",1, range="1min - 2.5min",2, range="2.5min - 5min",3,range="5min - 10min",4, range="10min - 30min",5, range="30min - 60min",6, range="> 1hr",7) |sort sort_order |eventstats sum(Number of Loans) as Total |eval "Average Duration (Seconds)"=round(Average,2) |eval "Average Attempt Count"=round('Average Attempt Count',2) |eval "Percentage of Data"=round('Number of Loans' / Total*100,2)."%" |fields range "Number of Loans" "Average Duration (Seconds)" "Average Attempt Count" "Percentage of Data" |rename range as Range]

panel.title: Duration Classification || Hour of the Day = $hour_token$

search.query:
index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending AttemptCount>=$min1_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max1_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval DurationSec=round((Duration*60),1) |eval mytime=relative_time(_time,"-4h") |eval HourOfTheDay=strftime(mytime,"%H")
|table _time LoanID DurationSec HourOfTheDay |search HourOfTheDay=$hour_token$ |rangemap field=DurationSec "< 20 seconds"=1-20 "21sec - 30sec"=21-30 "31sec - 45sec"=31-45 "46sec - 60sec"=46-60 "1min - 2.5min"=61-150 "2.5min - 5min"=151-300 "5min - 10min"=301-600 "10min - 30min"=601-1800 "30min - 60min"=1801-3600 "1hr - 8hrs"=3601-28800 "> 8hrs"=28801-99999999
|chart count over LoanID by range limit=15 |addcoltotals labelfield=TotalCount label=Range |search TotalCount=Range |fields TotalCount "< 20 seconds" "21sec - 30sec" "31sec - 45sec" "46sec - 60sec" "1min - 2.5min" "2.5min - 5min" "5min - 10min" "10min - 30min" "30min - 60min" "1hr - 8hrs" "> 8hrs"

panel.title: Duration Classification || Hour of the Day = $hour2_token$

search.query:
index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending AttemptCount>=$min2_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max2_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval DurationSec=round((Duration*60),1) |eval mytime=relative_time(_time,"-4h") |eval HourOfTheDay=strftime(mytime,"%H")
|table _time LoanID DurationSec HourOfTheDay |search HourOfTheDay=$hour2_token$ |rangemap field=DurationSec "< 20 seconds"=1-20 "21sec - 30sec"=21-30 "31sec - 45sec"=31-45 "46sec - 60sec"=46-60 "1min - 2.5min"=61-150 "2.5min - 5min"=151-300 "5min - 10min"=301-600 "10min - 30min"=601-1800 "30min - 60min"=1801-3600 "1hr - 8hrs"=3601-28800 "> 8hrs"=28801-99999999
|chart count over LoanID by range limit=15 |addcoltotals labelfield=TotalCount label=Range |search TotalCount=Range |fields TotalCount "< 20 seconds" "21sec - 30sec" "31sec - 45sec" "46sec - 60sec" "1min - 2.5min" "2.5min - 5min" "5min - 10min" "10min - 30min" "30min - 60min" "1hr - 8hrs" "> 8hrs"

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending AttemptCount>=$min1_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max1_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval mytime=relative_time(_time,"-4h") |eval HourOfTheDay=strftime(mytime,"%H") |eval "Eastern Time"=strftime(mytime,"%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S") |eval DurationSec=round((Duration*60),1) |eval TotalDuration=round(TotalDuration,2) | table TimeStamp LoanID LoanNumber DurationSec HourOfTheDay "Eastern Time" AttemptCount TotalDuration | rangemap field=DurationSec "< 20 seconds"=1-20 "21sec - 30sec"=21-30 "31sec - 45sec"=31-45 "46sec - 60sec"=46-60 "1min - 2.5min"=61-150 "2.5min - 5min"=151-300 "5min - 10min"=301-600 "10min - 30min"=601-1800 "30min - 60min"=1801-3600 "1hr - 8hrs"=3601-28800 "> 8hrs"=28801-99999999 | search range="$range1_token$" AND HourOfTheDay=$hour_token$ |eval "DurationMin"=DurationSec/60 |eval "DurationHr"=DurationSec/3600 |table "Eastern Time" LoanID LoanNumber $duration_tkn$ AttemptCount TotalDuration |sort -AttemptCount

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending AttemptCount>=$min2_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max2_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval mytime=relative_time(_time,"-4h") |eval HourOfTheDay=strftime(mytime,"%H") |eval "Eastern Time"=strftime(mytime,"%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S") |eval DurationSec=round((Duration*60),1) |eval TotalDuration=round(TotalDuration,2) | table TimeStamp LoanID LoanNumber DurationSec HourOfTheDay "Eastern Time" AttemptCount TotalDuration | rangemap field=DurationSec "< 20 seconds"=1-20 "21sec - 30sec"=21-30 "31sec - 45sec"=31-45 "46sec - 60sec"=46-60 "1min - 2.5min"=61-150 "2.5min - 5min"=151-300 "5min - 10min"=301-600 "10min - 30min"=601-1800 "30min - 60min"=1801-3600 "1hr - 8hrs"=3601-28800 "> 8hrs"=28801-99999999 | search range="$range2_token$" AND HourOfTheDay=$hour2_token$ |eval "DurationMin"=DurationSec/60 |eval "DurationHr"=DurationSec/3600 |table "Eastern Time" LoanID LoanNumber $duration2_tkn$ AttemptCount TotalDuration |sort -AttemptCount

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" TotalDuration>=0 Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending AttemptCount>=$min1_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max1_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval DurationSec=round((TotalDuration*60),1) |table _time LoanID DurationSec AttemptCount |rangemap field=DurationSec "< 60 seconds"=1-60 "1min - 2.5min"=61-150 "2.5min - 5min"=151-300 "5min - 10min"=301-600 "10min - 30min"=601-1800 "30min - 60min"=1801-3600 default="> 1hr"
|stats count as "Number of Loans" avg(DurationSec) as Average avg(AttemptCount) as "Average Attempt Count" by range |eval sort_order= case(range="< 60 seconds",1, range="1min - 2.5min",2, range="2.5min - 5min",3,range="5min - 10min",4, range="10min - 30min",5, range="30min - 60min",6, range="> 1hr",7) |sort sort_order |eventstats sum(Number of Loans) as Total |eval "Average Total Duration (Seconds)"=round(Average,2) |eval "Average Attempt Count"=round('Average Attempt Count',2) |eval "Percentage of Data"=round('Number of Loans' / Total*100,2)."%" |fields range "Number of Loans" "Average Total Duration (Seconds)" "Average Attempt Count" "Percentage of Data" |rename range as Range
|append [search index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" TotalDuration>=0 Environment=PROD AttemptCount>=$min1_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max1_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval DurationSec=round((TotalDuration*60),1) |table _time LoanID DurationSec AttemptCount |rangemap field=DurationSec "Total"=0-99999999
|stats count as "Number of Loans" avg(DurationSec) as Average avg(AttemptCount) as "Average Attempt Count" by range |eval sort_order= case(range="< 60 seconds",1, range="1min - 2.5min",2, range="2.5min - 5min",3,range="5min - 10min",4, range="10min - 30min",5, range="30min - 60min",6, range="> 1hr",7) |sort sort_order |eventstats sum(Number of Loans) as Total |eval "Average Total Duration (Seconds)"=round(Average,2) |eval "Average Attempt Count"=round('Average Attempt Count',2) |eval "Percentage of Data"=round('Number of Loans' / Total*100,2)."%" |fields range "Number of Loans" "Average Total Duration (Seconds)" "Average Attempt Count" "Percentage of Data" |rename range as Range]

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" TotalDuration>=0 Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending AttemptCount>=$min2_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max2_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval DurationSec=round((TotalDuration*60),1) |table _time LoanID DurationSec AttemptCount |rangemap field=DurationSec "< 60 seconds"=1-60 "1min - 2.5min"=61-150 "2.5min - 5min"=151-300 "5min - 10min"=301-600 "10min - 30min"=601-1800 "30min - 60min"=1801-3600 default="> 1hr"

|stats count as "Number of Loans" avg(DurationSec) as Average avg(AttemptCount) as "Average Attempt Count" by range |eval sort_order= case(range="< 60 seconds",1, range="1min - 2.5min",2, range="2.5min - 5min",3,range="5min - 10min",4, range="10min - 30min",5, range="30min - 60min",6, range="> 1hr",7) |sort sort_order |eventstats sum(Number of Loans) as Total |eval "Average Total Duration (Seconds)"=round(Average,2) |eval "Average Attempt Count"=round('Average Attempt Count',2) |eval "Percentage of Data"=round('Number of Loans' / Total*100,2)."%" |fields range "Number of Loans" "Average Total Duration (Seconds)" "Average Attempt Count" "Percentage of Data" |rename range as Range]

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending AttemptCount>=$min1_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max1_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval DurationSec=round((TotalDuration*60),1) |eval mytime=relative_time(_time,"-4h") |eval HourOfTheDay=strftime(mytime,"%H")
|table _time LoanID DurationSec HourOfTheDay |search HourOfTheDay=* |rangemap field=DurationSec "< 20 seconds"=1-20 "21sec - 30sec"=21-30 "31sec - 45sec"=31-45 "46sec - 60sec"=46-60 "1min - 2.5min"=61-150 "2.5min - 5min"=151-300 "5min - 10min"=301-600 "10min - 30min"=601-1800 "30min - 60min"=1801-3600 "1hr - 8hrs"=3601-28800 "> 8hrs"=28801-99999999

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending AttemptCount>=$min1_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max1_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval mytime=relative_time(_time,"-4h") |eval HourOfTheDay=strftime(mytime,"%H") |eval "Eastern Time"=strftime(mytime,"%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S") |eval DurationSec=round((TotalDuration*60),1) |eval TotalDuration=round(TotalDuration,2) | table TimeStamp LoanID LoanNumber DurationSec HourOfTheDay "Eastern Time" AttemptCount TotalDuration | rangemap field=DurationSec "< 20 seconds"=1-20 "21sec - 30sec"=21-30 "31sec - 45sec"=31-45 "46sec - 60sec"=46-60 "1min - 2.5min"=61-150 "2.5min - 5min"=151-300 "5min - 10min"=301-600 "10min - 30min"=601-1800 "30min - 60min"=1801-3600 "1hr - 8hrs"=3601-28800 "> 8hrs"=28801-99999999 | search range="$range3_token$" |eval "DurationMin"=DurationSec/60 |eval "DurationHr"=DurationSec/3600 |table "Eastern Time" LoanID LoanNumber $duration3_tkn$ AttemptCount TotalDuration |sort -AttemptCount

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending AttemptCount>=$min2_tkn$ AND AttemptCount<=$max2_tkn$ |dedup LoanID |eval mytime=relative_time(_time,"-4h") |eval HourOfTheDay=strftime(mytime,"%H") |eval "Eastern Time"=strftime(mytime,"%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S") |eval DurationSec=round((TotalDuration*60),1) |eval TotalDuration=round(TotalDuration,2) | table TimeStamp LoanID LoanNumber DurationSec HourOfTheDay "Eastern Time" AttemptCount TotalDuration | rangemap field=DurationSec "< 20 seconds"=1-20 "21sec - 30sec"=21-30 "31sec - 45sec"=31-45 "46sec - 60sec"=46-60 "1min - 2.5min"=61-150 "2.5min - 5min"=151-300 "5min - 10min"=301-600 "10min - 30min"=601-1800 "30min - 60min"=1801-3600 "1hr - 8hrs"=3601-28800 "> 8hrs"=28801-99999999 | search range="$range4_token$" |eval "DurationMin"=DurationSec/60 |eval "DurationHr"=DurationSec/3600 |table "Eastern Time" LoanID LoanNumber $duration4_tkn$ AttemptCount TotalDuration |sort -AttemptCount

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Duration>=0 Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending |dedup LoanID |table _time Duration LoanID |eval mytime=relative_time(_time,"-4h") |eval HourOfTheDay=strftime(mytime,"%H") |stats count by HourOfTheDay |makecontinuous HourOfTheDay |fillnull count

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Duration>=0 Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending |dedup LoanID |table _time Duration LoanID |eval mytime=relative_time(_time,"-4h") |eval HourOfTheDay=strftime(mytime,"%H") |stats count by HourOfTheDay |makecontinuous HourOfTheDay |fillnull count

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Duration>=0 Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending |dedup LoanID |eval _time=relative_time(_time,"-4h") |eval _time=strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") |table _time Duration |sort _time

index="main" sourcetype="cv_attempt_count" Duration>=0 Environment=PROD LoanNumber!=Pending |dedup LoanID |eval _time=relative_time(_time,"-4h") |eval _time=strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") |table _time Duration |sort _time
